text: Bridget Anne Robinson is a New Zealand oncology academic. As of 2018, she is a full professor at the University of Otago, holding the Mackenzie Chair since 2010. ==Academic career== After a 1985 MD titled 'Effects of vasoactive agents on tumour blood flow and cytotoxic drug uptake' at the University of Otago, Robinson joined the staff in Christchurch in 1997, rising to full professor. In the 2009 New Year Honours, Robinson was appointed an Officer of the New Zealand Order of Merit, for services to medicine. == Selected works == * Hanrahan, Vickie, Margaret J. Currie, Sarah P.
